properties.name: san marco square High Water pathways in Venice Acqua Alta -more information about on this bike hire shop, international courier and shipping of souvenirs agency's web space
properties.description: Posted by Deconcilio veneziaAcqua alta" (high water) is a phenomenon which generally takes place in Venice in winter time, when a combination of astronomical tide, strong south wind (scirocco) and seiche (see glossary below) can cause a larger inflow of water into the Venetian Lagoon. more information about pathways and excursions around Pellestrina cycling island in Venice (only one with cycling paths in Venice) on our link.
